description:
A full-featured Swiss Army Knife for your brain.

The full-featured mind mapping and brainstorming app. Like a Swiss Army Knife, Xmind offers a complete toolset for thinking and creativity.
1. Fixed an issue where clearing task duration caused errors.
2. Fixed an issue with formula display errors.
3. Fixed an issue where some keyboard shortcuts didn't work in Outliner.
4. Fixed an issue with inserting elements in Outliner.
5. Fixed other known issues.
